CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the biggest barrier you faced in registering for first Bitwise class?
CustomField.label: Biggest Registration Barrier

value.fullName: Lack of funds to pay for training courses
value.label: Lack of funds to pay for training courses

value.fullName: Lack of access to a high-speed internet connection
value.label: Lack of access to a high-speed internet connection

value.fullName: Lack of funds for a computer
value.label: Lack of funds for a computer

value.fullName: I do not face any of these barriers
value.label: I do not face any of these barriers

value.fullName: Lack of time due to work obligations
value.label: Lack of time due to work obligations

value.fullName: Lack of time due to family obligations
value.label: Lack of time due to family obligations

value.fullName: Lack of interest in the apprenticeship pathway you are taking
value.label: Lack of interest in the apprenticeship pathway you are taking
